application_practice.syntax_hint: Hints: last haircut, good/not so good, like to change, shorter/longer
application_practice.sample_answer:
Staff: How was your last haircut?
Customer: It was okay, but not perfect.
Staff: What would you like to change?
Customer: I'd like it shorter this time.

application_practice.syntax_hint: Was it too (long/short)? / I'll make it (better/shorter/longer) this time
application_practice.sample_answer:
Staff: Were you happy with your last haircut?
Customer: Not really. It was too long.
Staff: I see. I'll make it shorter this time. How short would you like it?
Customer: About 5 centimeters shorter.

application_practice.syntax_hint: Was it too (long/short/heavy/light)? / Any problems? / What didn't you like?

Staff: I understand. I'll make it lighter this time. Was the length okay?
Customer: Yes, the length was perfect.
